You can go to google.com/scarystories, and rediscover Halloween classics like Bram Stoker’s  Dracula, Mary Shelley’s Frankenstein, and Robert Louis Stevenson’s Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde, as well as less well-known tales like Thomas Hardy’s Victorian ghost story, “The Withered Arm”.  If you have not read these classics, do so.  You will be a better more educated and well rounded person.
